quotes.text: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.text: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: Focus and simplicity. Simple can be harder than complex.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Real change, enduring change, happens one step at a time.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.text: If you think you're too small to have an impact, try going to bed with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't count the days. Make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu (often quoted)

quotes.text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadows.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: You can have results or excuses.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn
